title: Openwork Crown for a Sculpture of a Bodhisattva, the Crown Including Auspicious Buddhist Emblems - Pagoda, Wheel of the Law, Flaming Jewels, Sun, Moon, Phoenxes, Lotus Blossoms (among others)
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Partial gift of the Walter C. Sedgwick Foundation and partial purchase through the Ernest B. and Helen Pratt Dane Fund for the Acquisition of Oriental Art
medium: Hammered sheet bronze with chasing  and chiseling and with ornaments of colored glass
provenance:
Shakris, San Francisco, CA, USA, Sold to Walter Sedgwick.
Walter C. Sedgwick, Woodside, CA, USA, Purchased from Shakris, San Francisco.
